name: early-bird
effect: This Pokémon's remaining sleep turn count falls by 2 rather than 1. If this Pokémon's sleep counter is at 1, it will fall to 0 and then the Pokémon will wake up.
short_effect: Makes sleep pass twice as quickly.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The Pokémon awakens twice as fast as other Pokémon from sleep.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The Pokémon awakens twice as fast as other Pokémon from sleep.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The Pokémon awakens from sleep twice as fast as other Pokémon.
